text: Ezɨ Delaila kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ manmaghsua, na mɨgɨa ghaze, nɨ bar na gifonge? Nɨ bar puvɨra na gifari. Nɨ na ko navir vamɨran itir puvatɨgha guizɨn akabar na mɨgeir puvatɨ. Datɨrɨghɨn namba 3ɨn dughiam, nɨ na gifaragha aghumsɨzim na ganɨngi, egha na mɨkemezir puvatɨ, nɨ manmaghɨra amigha bar gavgafi.”
